column2: "Not enough ARKS these days know about the FUN shop! It's such a shame!"
"The FUN shop is just in the building right next to the Interior Shop right over there..."
"Oh, anxiety has reared its ugly head even while we're talking! You, go have a look right now!"
"You know what you've got to do. The FUN shop! Go. to. the. FUN shop!"
"Come on, now, do it! It shouldn't be so difficult. Eradicate my anxiety for me!"
